Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29364903] Gram-negative bacteria:Burkholderia cepacia ATCC 17759(MBC=50μg/ml);Moraxella catarrhalis ATCC 25238(MBC=1.6μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide adopts overall content of unordered secondary structure that is 67%
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Novel Naja atra cardiotoxin 1 (CTX-1) derived antimicrobial peptides with broad spectrum activity.
Literature.Author: Sala A, Cabassi CS, Santospirito D, Polverini E, Flisi S, Cavirani S, Taddei S.
